amendatorysection.catchline: Hospital, long-term care facility, or pharmacy; use of automated medication system; policies and procedures required.
amendatorysection.para: Any hospital, long-term care facility, or pharmacy that uses an automated medication system shall develop, maintain, and comply with policies and procedures developed in consultation with the pharmacist responsible for pharmacist care for that hospital, long-term care facility, or pharmacy. At a minimum, the policies and procedures shall address the following:
(2) The name of the pharmacist responsible for implementation of and compliance with the policies and procedures;
(3) Medication access and information access procedures;
(4) Security of inventory and confidentiality of records in compliance with state and federal laws, rules, and regulations;
(8) Quality assurance and quality improvement programs and processes;
